meanings.definition: A device used to measure the electrical activity produced by muscles.
meanings.sent1: The electromyographs displayed the muscle signals on the screen.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use electromyographs to study muscle function.
meanings.sent3: The electromyographs at the gym were so advanced, they could even detect tiny muscle movements.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex network of electromyographs, each thought sparking a different signal.
meanings.sent5: The electromyographs hummed softly as they captured the muscle activity during the experiment.

meanings.definition: The process of recording muscle activity using specialized equipment.
meanings.sent1: During the test, the electromyographs recorded the muscle contractions.
meanings.sent2: Researchers rely on electromyographs to analyze muscle movements.
meanings.sent3: The electromyographs seemed to have a mind of their own, diligently recording every muscle twitch.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet room, the electromyographs whispered secrets of muscle activity.
meanings.sent5: The electromyographs painted a vivid picture of muscle activity, each line telling a story.
